title-group.article-title: Multivariate Normal Probabilities: Implementing an Old Idea of Plackett's

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2003 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: This article describes a reduction formula for the computation of multivariate normal probabilities first developed by Plackett. The method is recursive and, despite very promising results, seems not to have been implemented before. Extensive numerical results are given to compare the effectiveness of the approach to other methods from the literature.
